abstract: Is Warren Buffett waking up and smelling the Maxwell House? Rumors that the chief of Berkshire Hathaway is eyeing Kraft Foods caused a surge in call option activity in the company.
lead_paragraph: Is Warren Buffett waking up and smelling the Maxwell House? Rumors that the chief of Berkshire Hathaway is eyeing Kraft Foods caused a surge in call option activity in the company.

headline.main: Is Buffett Mulling Move on Kraft?
